rawConfiguration.text:
**THE DETAILS IN THIS DASHBOARD ARE ESTIMATES, THE [DATA MANAGEMENT HUB](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/data-management-nerdlets.data-management-launcher) SHOULD BE USED TO VIEW OFFICIAL INGESTION RATES**

This page analyzes data coming from the various [Microsoft Azure integrations](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/) available in New Relic. Data ingest for these integrations is most easily controlled in the individual service integration's [configuration settings](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/integrations/infrastructure-integrations/cloud-integrations/configure-polling-frequency-data-collection-cloud-integrations/).

*If you find a missing integration, please [open an issue](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/issues/new/choose) on our GitHub!*

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(GigabytesIngested) AS '1 DAY (GB)', rate(sum(GigabytesIngested), 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)' FROM NrConsumption WHERE productLine='DataPlatform' AND usageMetric LIKE '%InfraIntegration%' LIMIT MAX SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO

FROM AzureApiManagementServiceSample, AzureAppServiceWebAppSample, AzureAppServiceHostNameSample, AzureAppServicePlan, 
AzureApplicationGatewaySample, AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample, AzureContainersRegistrySample, AzureContainersManagedClusterSample, 
AzureCosmosDbAccountSample, AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample, AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample, AzureCostManagementSample, 
AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample, AzureDataFactoryFactorySample, AzureMariaDbServerSample, AzureMySqlServerSample, 
AzurePostgreSqlServerSample, AzureEventHubNamespaceSample, AzureEventHubClusterSample, AzureExpressRoutePortSample, 
AzureExpressRouteCircuitSample, AzureExpressRoutePeeringSample, AzureExpressRouteConnectionSample, AzureExpressRouteGatewaySample, 
AzureFirewallSample, AzureFrontDoorFrontDoorSample, AzureFunctionsAppSample, AzureKeyVaultVaultSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerSample, AzureLoadBalancerBackendSample, AzureLoadBalancerFrontendIpSample, AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatPoolSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatRuleSample, AzureLoadBalancerProbeSample, AzureLoadBalancerRuleSample, AzureLogicAppsWorkflowSample, 
AzureLogicAppsIntegrationServiceEnvironmentSample, AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample, AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample, AzureRedisCacheSample, 
AzureRedisCacheShardSample, AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample, AzureServiceBusQueueSample, AzureServiceBusTopicSample, 
AzureServiceBusSubscriptionSample, AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample, AzureSqlDatabaseSample, AzureSqlElasticPoolSample, 
AzureSqlFirewallSample, AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample, AzureSqlRestorePointSample, AzureSqlServerSample, 
AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample, AzureStorageAccountSample, AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample, AzureVirtualMachineSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksIpConfigurationSample ,AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterface, AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterfaceSample, AzureVirtualNetworksPeeringSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksPublicIpAddressSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityGroupSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityRuleSample,AzureVirtualNetworksRouteSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksRouteTableSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSubnetSample, AzureVirtualNetworksSample, AzureVPNGatewaysSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)' 
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO 
LIMIT MAX

FROM AzureApiManagementServiceSample, AzureAppServiceWebAppSample, AzureAppServiceHostNameSample, AzureAppServicePlan, 
AzureApplicationGatewaySample, AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample, AzureContainersRegistrySample, AzureContainersManagedClusterSample, 
AzureCosmosDbAccountSample, AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample, AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample, AzureCostManagementSample, 
AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample, AzureDataFactoryFactorySample, AzureMariaDbServerSample, AzureMySqlServerSample, 
AzurePostgreSqlServerSample, AzureEventHubNamespaceSample, AzureEventHubClusterSample, AzureExpressRoutePortSample, 
AzureExpressRouteCircuitSample, AzureExpressRoutePeeringSample, AzureExpressRouteConnectionSample, AzureExpressRouteGatewaySample, 
AzureFirewallSample, AzureFrontDoorFrontDoorSample, AzureFunctionsAppSample, AzureKeyVaultVaultSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerSample, AzureLoadBalancerBackendSample, AzureLoadBalancerFrontendIpSample, AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatPoolSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatRuleSample, AzureLoadBalancerProbeSample, AzureLoadBalancerRuleSample, AzureLogicAppsWorkflowSample, 
AzureLogicAppsIntegrationServiceEnvironmentSample, AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample, AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample, AzureRedisCacheSample, 
AzureRedisCacheShardSample, AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample, AzureServiceBusQueueSample, AzureServiceBusTopicSample, 
AzureServiceBusSubscriptionSample, AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample, AzureSqlDatabaseSample, AzureSqlElasticPoolSample, 
AzureSqlFirewallSample, AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample, AzureSqlRestorePointSample, AzureSqlServerSample, 
AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample, AzureStorageAccountSample, AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample, AzureVirtualMachineSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksIpConfigurationSample ,AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterface, AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterfaceSample, AzureVirtualNetworksPeeringSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksPublicIpAddressSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityGroupSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityRuleSample,AzureVirtualNetworksRouteSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksRouteTableSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSubnetSample, AzureVirtualNetworksSample, AzureVPNGatewaysSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET CASES(
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample') AS 'AI & Machine Learning',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample', 'AzureDataFactoryFactorySample', 'AzureEventHubNamespaceSample', 'AzureEventHubClusterSample', 'AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample') AS 'Analytics',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureAppServiceWebAppSample', 'AzureAppServiceHostNameSample','AzureAppServicePlan', 'AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample', 'AzureContainersRegistrySample', 'AzureContainersManagedClusterSample', 'AzureFunctionsAppSample', 'AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample', 'AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample', 'AzureVirtualMachineSample') AS 'Compute',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureRedisCacheSample', 'AzureRedisCacheShardSample', 'AzureCosmosDbAccountSample', 'AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample', 'AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample', 'AzureMariaDbServerSample', 'AzureMySqlServerSample', 'AzurePostgreSqlServerSample', 'AzureSqlDatabaseSample', 'AzureSqlElasticPoolSample', 'AzureSqlFirewallSample', 'AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample', 'AzureSqlRestorePointSample', 'AzureSqlServerSample', 'AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample') AS 'Database',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureApiManagementServiceSample', 'AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample', 'AzureServiceBusQueueSample', 'AzureServiceBusTopicSample', 'AzureServiceBusSubscriptionSample', 'AzureLogicAppsWorkflowSample', 'AzureLogicAppsIntegrationServiceEnvironmentSample') AS 'Integration',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureCostManagementSample') AS 'Management & Governance',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureApplicationGatewaySample', 'AzureExpressRoutePortSample', 'AzureExpressRouteCircuitSample', 'AzureExpressRoutePeeringSample', 'AzureExpressRouteConnectionSample', 'AzureExpressRouteGatewaySample', 'AzureFirewallSample', 'AzureFrontDoorFrontDoorSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerBackendSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerFrontendIpSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatPoolSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatRuleSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerProbeSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerRuleSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksIpConfigurationSample' ,'AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterface', 'AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterfaceSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksPeeringSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksPublicIpAddressSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityGroupSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityRuleSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksRouteSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksRouteTableSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSubnetSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSample', 'AzureVPNGatewaysSample') AS 'Networking',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureKeyVaultVaultSample') AS 'Security',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureStorageAccountSample') AS 'Storage'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM AzureApiManagementServiceSample, AzureAppServiceWebAppSample, AzureAppServiceHostNameSample, AzureAppServicePlan, 
AzureApplicationGatewaySample, AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample, AzureContainersRegistrySample, AzureContainersManagedClusterSample, 
AzureCosmosDbAccountSample, AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample, AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample, AzureCostManagementSample, 
AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample, AzureDataFactoryFactorySample, AzureMariaDbServerSample, AzureMySqlServerSample, 
AzurePostgreSqlServerSample, AzureEventHubNamespaceSample, AzureEventHubClusterSample, AzureExpressRoutePortSample, 
AzureExpressRouteCircuitSample, AzureExpressRoutePeeringSample, AzureExpressRouteConnectionSample, AzureExpressRouteGatewaySample, 
AzureFirewallSample, AzureFrontDoorFrontDoorSample, AzureFunctionsAppSample, AzureKeyVaultVaultSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerSample, AzureLoadBalancerBackendSample, AzureLoadBalancerFrontendIpSample, AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatPoolSample, 
AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatRuleSample, AzureLoadBalancerProbeSample, AzureLoadBalancerRuleSample, AzureLogicAppsWorkflowSample, 
AzureLogicAppsIntegrationServiceEnvironmentSample, AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample, AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample, AzureRedisCacheSample, 
AzureRedisCacheShardSample, AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample, AzureServiceBusQueueSample, AzureServiceBusTopicSample, 
AzureServiceBusSubscriptionSample, AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample, AzureSqlDatabaseSample, AzureSqlElasticPoolSample, 
AzureSqlFirewallSample, AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample, AzureSqlRestorePointSample, AzureSqlServerSample, 
AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample, AzureStorageAccountSample, AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample, AzureVirtualMachineSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksIpConfigurationSample ,AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterface, AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterfaceSample, AzureVirtualNetworksPeeringSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksPublicIpAddressSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityGroupSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityRuleSample,AzureVirtualNetworksRouteSample, 
AzureVirtualNetworksRouteTableSample,AzureVirtualNetworksSubnetSample, AzureVirtualNetworksSample, AzureVPNGatewaysSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET CASES(
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureApiManagementServiceSample') AS 'API Management',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureAppServiceWebAppSample', 'AzureAppServiceHostNameSample','AzureAppServicePlan') AS 'App Service',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureApplicationGatewaySample') AS 'Application Gateway',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample', 'AzureContainersRegistrySample', 'AzureContainersManagedClusterSample') AS 'Containers',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureCosmosDbAccountSample', 'AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample', 'AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample') AS 'Cosmos DB',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureCostManagementSample') AS 'Cost Management',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample', 'AzureDataFactoryFactorySample') AS 'Data Factory',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMariaDbServerSample') AS 'Database for MariaDB',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMySqlServerSample') AS 'Database for MySQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePostgreSqlServerSample') AS 'Database for PostgreSQL',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureEventHubNamespaceSample', 'AzureEventHubClusterSample') AS 'Event Hubs',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureExpressRoutePortSample', 'AzureExpressRouteCircuitSample', 'AzureExpressRoutePeeringSample', 'AzureExpressRouteConnectionSample', 'AzureExpressRouteGatewaySample') AS 'Express Route',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureFirewallSample') AS 'Azure Firewall',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureFrontDoorFrontDoorSample') AS 'Azure Front Door',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureFunctionsAppSample') AS 'Azure Functions',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureKeyVaultVaultSample') AS 'Azure Key Vault',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureLoadBalancerSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerBackendSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerFrontendIpSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatPoolSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerInboundNatRuleSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerProbeSample', 'AzureLoadBalancerRuleSample') AS 'Load Balancer',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureLogicAppsWorkflowSample', 'AzureLogicAppsIntegrationServiceEnvironmentSample') AS 'Logic Apps',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample') AS 'Machine Learning',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample') AS 'Power BI',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureRedisCacheSample', 'AzureRedisCacheShardSample') AS 'Redis Cache',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureServiceBusNamespaceSample', 'AzureServiceBusQueueSample', 'AzureServiceBusTopicSample', 'AzureServiceBusSubscriptionSample') AS 'Service Bus',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample') AS 'Service Fabric',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlDatabaseSample', 'AzureSqlElasticPoolSample', 'AzureSqlFirewallSample', 'AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample', 'AzureSqlRestorePointSample', 'AzureSqlServerSample') AS 'SQL Database',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample') AS 'SQL Managed Instances',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureStorageAccountSample') AS 'Azure Storage',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample') AS 'VM Scale Sets',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineSample') AS 'Virtual Machines',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualNetworksIpConfigurationSample' ,'AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterface', 'AzureVirtualNetworksNetworkInterfaceSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksPeeringSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksPublicIpAddressSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityGroupSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSecurityRuleSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksRouteSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksRouteTableSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSubnetSample', 'AzureVirtualNetworksSample') AS 'Virtual Network',
WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVPNGatewaysSample') AS 'VPN Gateway'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT 25

rawConfiguration.text:
# Available Integrations for AI & Machine Learning Services

 * [Azure Machine Learning](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-machine-learning-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
	AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample
SELECT
bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Azure Integrations in Use (Other charts will be blank)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
	AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample
SELECT uniqueCount(entityName) AS 'Unique Sources'
FACET CASES(
	WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample') AS 'Machine Learning'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: AI & Machine Learning Services Ingest Timeline

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
	AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS 'GB Ingest'
FACET CASES(
	WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample') AS 'Machine Learning'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureMachineLearningWorkspaceSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

rawConfiguration.text:
# Available Integrations for Analytics Services

 * [Azure Data Factory](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-data-factory-integration/)
 * [Azure Event Hub](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-event-hub-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Power BI Dedicated](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-power-bi-dedicated-capacities-monitoring-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample,
  AzureDataFactoryFactorySample,
  AzureEventHubNamespaceSample,
  AzureEventHubClusterSample,
  AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample
SELECT
bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Azure Integrations in Use (Other charts will be blank)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample,
  AzureDataFactoryFactorySample,
  AzureEventHubNamespaceSample,
  AzureEventHubClusterSample,
  AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample
SELECT uniqueCount(entityName) AS 'Unique Sources'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample', 'AzureDataFactoryFactorySample') AS 'Data Factory',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureEventHubNamespaceSample', 'AzureEventHubClusterSample') AS 'Event Hub',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample') AS 'Power BI'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
  AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample,
  AzureDataFactoryFactorySample,
  AzureEventHubNamespaceSample,
  AzureEventHubClusterSample,
  AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS 'GB Ingest'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample', 'AzureDataFactoryFactorySample') AS 'Data Factory',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureEventHubNamespaceSample', 'AzureEventHubClusterSample') AS 'Event Hub',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample') AS 'Power BI'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample, AzureDataFactoryFactorySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureDataFactoryDataFactorySample, AzureDataFactoryFactorySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzureEventHubNamespaceSample, AzureEventHubClusterSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureEventHubNamespaceSample, AzureEventHubClusterSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Azure Power BI Dedicated - Top 10 Sources

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
AzurePowerBIDedicatedCapacitySample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

rawConfiguration.text:
# Available Integrations for Compute Services

 * [Azure App Service](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-app-service-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Containers](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-containers-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Functions](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-functions-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Service Fabric](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-service-fabric-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure VM Scale Sets](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-virtual-machine-scale-sets-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Virtual Machines](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-vms-monitoring-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureAppServiceWebAppSample,
  AzureAppServiceHostNameSample,
  AzureAppServicePlan,
  AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample,
  AzureContainersRegistrySample,
  AzureContainersManagedClusterSample,
  AzureFunctionsAppSample,
  AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineSample
SELECT
bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Azure Integrations in Use (Other charts will be blank)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureAppServiceWebAppSample,
  AzureAppServiceHostNameSample,
  AzureAppServicePlan,
  AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample,
  AzureContainersRegistrySample,
  AzureContainersManagedClusterSample,
  AzureFunctionsAppSample,
  AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineSample
SELECT uniqueCount(entityName) AS 'Unique Sources'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureAppServiceWebAppSample', 'AzureAppServiceHostNameSample','AzureAppServicePlan') AS 'App Service',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample', 'AzureContainersRegistrySample', 'AzureContainersManagedClusterSample') AS 'Containers',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureFunctionsAppSample') AS 'Azure Functions',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample') AS 'Service Fabric',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample') AS 'VM Scale Sets',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineSample') AS 'Virtual Machines'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
  AzureAppServiceWebAppSample,
  AzureAppServiceHostNameSample,
  AzureAppServicePlan,
  AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample,
  AzureContainersRegistrySample,
  AzureContainersManagedClusterSample,
  AzureFunctionsAppSample,
  AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample,
  AzureVirtualMachineSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS 'GB Ingest'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureAppServiceWebAppSample', 'AzureAppServiceHostNameSample','AzureAppServicePlan') AS 'App Service',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample', 'AzureContainersRegistrySample', 'AzureContainersManagedClusterSample') AS 'Containers',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureFunctionsAppSample') AS 'Azure Functions',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample') AS 'Service Fabric',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample') AS 'VM Scale Sets',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureVirtualMachineSample') AS 'Virtual Machines'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureAppServiceWebAppSample, AzureAppServiceHostNameSample, AzureAppServicePlan
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureAppServiceWebAppSample, AzureAppServiceHostNameSample, AzureAppServicePlan
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample, AzureContainersRegistrySample, AzureContainersManagedClusterSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureContainersInstanceGroupSample, AzureContainersRegistrySample, AzureContainersManagedClusterSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzureFunctionsAppSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureFunctionsAppSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureServiceFabricApplicationSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8
FACET entityName
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
LIMIT 10

FROM
AzureVirtualMachineScaleSetSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
# Available Integrations for Database Services

 * [Azure Cache for Redis](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-redis-cache-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Cosmos DB](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-cosmos-db-document-db-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Database for MariaDB](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-database-mariadb-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Database for MySQL](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-database-mysql-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure Database for PostgreSQL](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-database-postgresql-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure SQL Database](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-sql-database-monitoring-integration/)
 * [Azure SQL Managed Instances](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/microsoft-azure-integrations/azure-integrations-list/azure-sql-managed-instances-monitoring-integration/)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureRedisCacheSample,
  AzureRedisCacheShardSample,
  AzureCosmosDbAccountSample,
  AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample,
  AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample,
  AzureMariaDbServerSample,
  AzureMySqlServerSample,
  AzurePostgreSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlDatabaseSample,
  AzureSqlElasticPoolSample,
  AzureSqlFirewallSample,
  AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample,
  AzureSqlRestorePointSample,
  AzureSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample
SELECT
bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)',
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Azure Integrations in Use (Other charts will be blank)

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM
  AzureRedisCacheSample,
  AzureRedisCacheShardSample,
  AzureCosmosDbAccountSample,
  AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample,
  AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample,
  AzureMariaDbServerSample,
  AzureMySqlServerSample,
  AzurePostgreSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlDatabaseSample,
  AzureSqlElasticPoolSample,
  AzureSqlFirewallSample,
  AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample,
  AzureSqlRestorePointSample,
  AzureSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample
SELECT uniqueCount(entityName) AS 'Unique Sources'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureRedisCacheSample', 'AzureRedisCacheShardSample') AS 'Cache for Redis',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureCosmosDbAccountSample', 'AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample', 'AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample') AS 'Cosmos DB',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMariaDbServerSample') AS 'Database for MariaDB',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMySqlServerSample') AS 'Database for MySQL',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePostgreSqlServerSample') AS 'Database for PostgreSQL',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlDatabaseSample', 'AzureSqlElasticPoolSample', 'AzureSqlFirewallSample', 'AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample', 'AzureSqlRestorePointSample',   'AzureSqlServerSample') AS 'SQL Database',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample') AS 'SQL Managed Instances'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO
LIMIT MAX

FROM
  AzureRedisCacheSample,
  AzureRedisCacheShardSample,
  AzureCosmosDbAccountSample,
  AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample,
  AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample,
  AzureMariaDbServerSample,
  AzureMySqlServerSample,
  AzurePostgreSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlDatabaseSample,
  AzureSqlElasticPoolSample,
  AzureSqlFirewallSample,
  AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample,
  AzureSqlRestorePointSample,
  AzureSqlServerSample,
  AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS 'GB Ingest'
FACET CASES(
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureRedisCacheSample', 'AzureRedisCacheShardSample') AS 'Cache for Redis',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureCosmosDbAccountSample', 'AzureCosmosDbDatabaseSample', 'AzureCosmosDbCollectionSample') AS 'Cosmos DB',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMariaDbServerSample') AS 'Database for MariaDB',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureMySqlServerSample') AS 'Database for MySQL',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzurePostgreSqlServerSample') AS 'Database for PostgreSQL',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlDatabaseSample', 'AzureSqlElasticPoolSample', 'AzureSqlFirewallSample', 'AzureSqlReplicationLinkSample', 'AzureSqlRestorePointSample',   'AzureSqlServerSample') AS 'SQL Database',
  WHERE eventType() IN ('AzureSqlManagedInstanceSample') AS 'SQL Managed Instances'
) OR eventType()
SINCE 7 DAYS AGO
TIMESERIES
LIMIT MAX

FROM
AzureRedisCacheSample, AzureRedisCacheShardSample
SELECT bytecountestimate()/10e8 AS '1 DAY (GB)', 
rate(bytecountestimate()/10e8, 1 MONTH) AS '1 MONTH (GB)'
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO
LIMIT MAX
